sampleRandomDistribution

public static PVector sampleRandomDistribution(int dim)
Generates of a random vector \f$ v = (x_1, x_2, \cdots )\f$ where each component is drawn uniformly in \f$ \mathcal{U}(0,1)\f$. The vector is normalized such as \f$ \sum_i x_i = 1 \f$.

Parameters:
dim - dimension of the vector
Returns:
random vector
